verses.name: Luke 13:19
verses.text: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and cast into his garden; and it grew, and waxed a great tree; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it.

verses.name: Luke 13:20
verses.text: And again he said, Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God?

verses.name: Luke 13:21
verses.text: It is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal, till the whole was leavened.

verses.name: Luke 13:22
verses.text: And he went through the cities and villages, teaching, and journeying toward Jerusalem.

verses.name: Luke 13:23
verses.text: Then said one unto him, Lord, are there few that be saved? And he said unto them,
